short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BestKabu: Improve your experience of digikabu.de

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BestKabu is a Simple Browser extension that makes digikabu de better.
The current features are:
- Dark mode
- Better White mode than original
- Auto login
- Timer to next lesson
- Button to mebis
- Highlighting for the current day and current lesson in custom color
- Highlighting for lessons

If you find any bugs or have feature request, please submit them on our github:
https://github.com/Random-user420/bestKabu/issues
